settings.heading: What are your jewellery made of?
settings.row_content: Most of our jewellery pieces are made in 14K solid gold, some with gemstones. A selected range of small hoop earrings are made in silver with 20-22K 3-micron gold vermeil.

settings.heading: Will your jewellery tarnish?
settings.row_content: It is generally much harder to solid gold pieces to tarnish compared to gold vermeil pieces. However, gold is still a metal that requires proper care, for example, no harsh chemicals should come in contact with gold. Gold vermeil pieces can tarnish overtime if not cared for properly or simply due to environmental factors as it is plated on silver. However, with proper care, the life of gold vermeil jewellery can be prolonged significantly. Please refer to our Care page for further details on how to care for your jewellery.
